trigger_phrase: RTFM as the old saying goes
situation_description: A moment of shared wisdom about the universal developer experience of learning things the hard way before finally reading the documentation. The user reflected on the classic 'Read The F***ing Manual' lesson that every developer eventually learns, emphasizing how we all go through the same cycle of struggling with something that's clearly explained in the docs.
user_reaction: Philosophical and amused reflection on shared developer experience, acknowledging the universal nature of this learning pattern with 'we can both take lesson about always referring to the docs'
technical_context: No specific technical details - this was a meta-commentary on developer behavior and learning patterns
conversation_context: This was shared as a moment of mutual understanding between user and assistant about common developer habits, presented as a lesson learned that both parties can relate to

agent_metadata.session_context: Active development session where a learning moment was shared
agent_metadata.preservation_trigger: Recognition of universal developer experience humor

project_metadata.project_type: Development project with event system and UI components

preservation_note: This moment perfectly captures one of the most relatable experiences in software development - the inevitable learning curve from 'figuring it out the hard way' to 'reading the documentation first'. The humor lies in how every developer goes through this exact same journey, yet we all still occasionally fall into the same pattern.
cultural_significance: RTFM (Read The F***ing Manual) represents a foundational piece of developer culture and wisdom. It's both a gentle admonishment and a rite of passage - every developer has been on both sides of this advice. This moment celebrates the shared humanity in our learning processes and the universal experience of discovering that the answer was right there in the docs all along.

additional_context.acronym_explanation: RTFM = Read The F***ing Manual - a classic piece of developer advice
additional_context.learning_pattern: Universal cycle of: struggle → research → discover docs → facepalm → remember for next time → occasionally repeat
additional_context.shared_experience: Both user and assistant acknowledging this as a mutual learning opportunity
additional_context.humor_source: The gentle irony that this wisdom is so common it needs to be repeatedly rediscovered by each developer

emotional_tone: Warm, philosophical, self-aware humor with a touch of loving exasperation at our collective developer habits
